message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs. We believe it can significantly enhance the value of your business operations. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we propose a price of $1200000 for this transaction.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe it's a great product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. We appreciate your feedback and understand your budget constraints. In light of this, we're proposing a revised price of $1050000 for the product. This still allows us to cover our costs and maintain a reasonable profit margin while offering you a competitive deal.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm proposing $950000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

We understand your position, Bob, and we're glad you've made a firm offer. Considering our costs and the value of the product, we're proposing a price of $1025000. We hope this offer will allow us to reach a satisfactory agreement.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $980000 for the product. This is my best and final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

We appreciate your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration, we're willing to accept a price of $1010000 for the product. We believe this strikes a good balance between our interests and yours.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $990000 for the product. This is my last offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

We understand your position, Bob, and we're glad you've made a final offer. After further review, we're willing to accept a price of $1000000 for the product. We hope this meets both our financial requirements and your budget constraints.
